code: import{getMarkers,writeMarker}from"../util/marker_util";export var RECEIVE_MARKERS="RECEIVE_MARKERS";export var RECEIVE_MARKER="RECEIVE_MARKER";export var receiveMarkers=function receiveMarkers(markers){return{type:RECEIVE_MARKERS,markers:markers};};export var receiveMarker=function receiveMarker(marker){return{type:RECEIVE_MARKER,marker:marker};};export var fetchMarkers=function fetchMarkers(){return function(dispatch){return getMarkers().then(function(markers){return dispatch(receiveMarkers(markers));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var createMarker=function createMarker(data){return function(dispatch){return writeMarker(data).then(function(marker){return dispatch(receiveMarker(marker));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
